attributes.action: No mandatory vaccines, no restriction ,loss of liberty to those who refuse it .
attributes.additional_details:
I believe it is everyone’s basic human right to decide what drugs are taken by them . 
Any forced vaccinations or drugs administered forcibly, wether physical or by coercive means to be counter to the free democracy which  we live in and against our individual human rights . 
Forced vaccinations are the stuff of authoritarianism and should never be made mandatory in a free democracy.
attributes.background: mps to debate a bill to make law that any vaccine should be voluntary and not mandatory an individuals free choice . No individual should lose their liberty nor be penalised  or excluded from any anything,nor any aspect of life which is available to those who choose to take the vaccine.

rejection.details:
It is already against the law for people to be required to undergo medical treatment, including vaccinations. The Coronavirus Act 2020 has not changed this.

You might like to sign this related petition:

Prevent any restrictions on those who refuse a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323442
